mapper.insert: insert into t_profile(ID, ProjectID, ExpectedValue, ProfilePoint, Trice, CreateTime, CreateUser, UpdateTime, UpdateUser, Description) values ( #{ID}, #{ProjectID}, #{ExpectedValue}, #{ProfilePoint}, #{Trice}, #{CreateTime}, #{CreateUser}, #{UpdateTime}, #{UpdateUser}, #{Description} )
